lines:
1956

September 25, 2911.

ur. S. C. Luk,

224 North Wayne Street,

Angola, Indiana,

ály dear ink:

Thanks for your nota. I en inclosing check for $200. herewith as 
Kindly sign and return the inclosed receipt.

requested.

accept my best wishes for success in the new life, and when you can

spare time dator let me have a word telling me how things are going with you.

Very sincerely yours,

Principale
